title: Shoulderstand
description: Hold the pose and take slow, deep breaths into your belly. Lower your feet behind your head, place your palms flat on the floor, tuck your chin into your chest and with an exhale slowly roll down one vertebra at a time. Always follow shoulderstand with its counterposes, Plow and Fish. Soften tongue and throat Press upper arms and shoulders into floor Avoid this pose if you have high blood pressure, headache, neck injury, or a heart condition.
